ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automated discovery of zero-day vulnerabilities in Python projects using AI and static code analysis.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Zero-shot vulnerability discovery using LLMs â€¢ Identifies complex, multi-step vulnerabilities â€¢ Analyzes code call chains from user input to server output â€¢ Supports Python codebases â€¢ Detects vulnerability classes: LFI, AFO, RCE, XSS, SQLI, SSRF, IDOR
ðŸ“– Summary: Vulnhuntr is a Python tool that uses Large Language Models (LLMs) combined with static code analysis to discover complex, multi-step, remotely exploitable vulnerabilities in Python codebases. It aims to find zero-day vulnerabilities that traditional static analysis tools might miss by analyzing entire code call chains from user input to server output.
